history.narrative: Law 1-86 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-198, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first, amended first and second readings, and reconsideration of second reading, on April 20, 1976, June 15, 1976, May 18, 1976 and June 20, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 19, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-141 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
